Scripts.OnClick: Epsilon_AuraManager_ToggleShowHidden() if Epsilon_AuraManager.showHidden then self:SetNormalTexture("interface/moneyframe/arrow-right-up.blp") self:SetPushedTexture("interface/moneyframe/arrow-right-down.blp") else self:SetNormalTexture("interface/moneyframe/arrow-left-up.blp") self:SetPushedTexture("interface/moneyframe/arrow-left-down.blp") end self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self);
